import React, { Component } from "react"; class Cart extends Component { state = { arr: [] }; deleteFromCart=(id)=>{ fetch(`/shopping-cart/${id}`, { method: "DELETE" }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(json => console.log(json)); } updateQuantity=(id)=> (event) =>{ fetch(`/shopping-cart/${id}`, { method: "PATCH", body: JSON.stringify({ quantity: event.target.value }), headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" } }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(json => console.log(json)); } componentDidMount() { fetch("/shopping-cart") .then(res => res.json()) .then(arr => this.setState({ arr })); } render() { return (
{this.state.arr.map(x => ( ))}
PRODUCT
PRICE
QUANTITY
REMOVE
{" "} {x.brand} {x.model}
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit.{" "}

); } } export default Cart;
